text: Santa Felicidade is a neighborhood of Curitiba, Paraná, Brazil. The Santa Felicidade neighborhood began in 1878 when Italian immigrants arrived in Paraná. Today it is famous for its many fine restaurants serving typical Italian food. Besides good food, visitors and tourists have great attractions such as: * House of geraniúm * House Culpi Two secular buildings and typical of Italian immigrants. The neighborhood is a tribute to the woman Portuguese Felicidade Borges. ==Other websites== * The Santa Felicidade District Districts of Curitiba == Bibliography == * Category:Curitiba Category:Neighborhoods Category:1878 establishments Category:1870s establishments in Brazil
title: Santa Felicidade neighborhood
